researchers.post: Hi Stephen, you have a lot content on The Shroud of Jesus Christ.  I visit your site to see what else there is to learn on The Shroud.  We need to spread the Good News on the piece of clue Jesus Christ left on behalf of his Resurrection.  I also have a site dedicated to The Shroud of Turin.www.shroudofturinnews.com
